item.title: SoftLayer_Container_User_Customer_PasswordSet
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_User_Customer_PasswordSet Datatype Description Container for holding information necessary for the setting and resetting of customer passwords Local answeredSecurityQuestionId id of SoftLayer_User_Security_Question Type: integer authenticationMethods the authentication methods required Type: array of integers key the password key provided to user in the password set url link sent via email Type: string password the user's new password Type: string
